title: Salgado
extract: Salgado is a municipality located in the Brazilian state of Sergipe. It has an area of 248 km2 (96 sq mi) and an estimated population of 20,000 (2018).
extract_html: Salgado is a municipality located in the Brazilian state of Sergipe. It has an area of 248 km2 (96 sq mi) and an estimated population of 20,000 (2018).
